prod_short_desc: Catch the crook before he tows the safe away!
prod_long_desc:
Be part of the action with the LEGO® City police as they race after the crook trying to tow away a safe. This set includes a tow truck with winch arm and hook, police off-road bike and a police pursuit bike with radio, plus a safe with a large opening door and smaller compartment inside, money bills, jewel and other accessory elements. Includes three minifigures.
Build a tow truck with a stolen safe, and two police bikes to chase it down!
Tow truck has a movable tow arm, hook, and chain to tow the safe
Includes male and female police officers and a crook minifigure, plus gear and accessories
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Tow truck is over 2” high, 4” long, and 1” wide. Safe is over 2” high, 1” wide, and 1” long. Off-road bike is over 1” high, 2” long, and 1” wide. Pursuit bike is over 1” high, 2” long, and 1” wide
144 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
